lead_paragraph: AS Roma pounced on two dreadful Lazio mistakes to claim a 2-0 Serie A victory in a hot-tempered derby boycotted by their own supporters on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Roma Pounce on Errors to Win Hot-Tempered Derby
headline.main: Roma Pounce on Errors to Win Hot-Tempered Derby

snippet: AS Roma pounced on two dreadful Lazio mistakes to claim a 2-0 Serie A victory in a hot-tempered derby boycotted by their own supporters on Sunday....
